divs: Sighting DetailsI went out side to take my dog out for the night potty break about 10:00P.M on the 10th and look up like I usely do and saw so may bright lights going east to west I call my husband to come out side to see them also they were so pretty they were very bright lights I took some pictures with my cell phone In 20 min we say about fifty of them the clouds were coming in and they were under the clouds you could see them slowly moving they were not fast moving but very slow I call my Daugther in Il. but she didn't see them there , so I call my other daugther that lived about 10 mi from me and she could see them as well . I wish I could let everyone see them but I dont have text on my cell phone So I can't send them to the computer
Summary: They where very bright and some was side by side there were about fifty in 20 min.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hardy
This sighting has never been favorited.
